text: To prepare your development environment setup: Download the devkit package to the PC where you will do the DTK work by opening the Downloads dialog from the User Settings menu in Desktop, see User Settings , and click on the devkit_<version>.zip file. Create an installation directory for the Devkit. Extract the devkit package to your installation directory <devkit_dir> Set up the environment variables for the DTK. In your development environment or build scripts you must include the devkit.jar in the class path (that was extracted above, in devkit_<version>/lib) in the class path. For example: > javac -cp <devkit dir>/lib/devkit.jar -sourcepath . com/mycompany/myplugin/*.java Where: com/mycompany/myplugin/, is the code that you will build
title: Installation and Setup - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
